item.title: Practical Tips on Writing an Effective Web Crawler
item.author: guanlan
item.description: A web crawler is a hard-working bot to gather information or index the pages on the Internet. It starts at some seeds URLs and finds every hyperlink on each page, and then crawler will visit those hyperlinks recursively. 1. Choose an Ideal Programming Language Here is a ranking of popular languages on developing web crawlers (based on result numbers of relative repositories host on Github on February, 2013): Python or Ruby probably is a wise choice, the mainly speed limit of web crawler is network latency not CPU, so choose Python or Ruby as a language to develop a web crawler will make life easier.
